ax.ha.it.smsalarm

Class SmsReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.SmsReceiver

  • public class SmsReceiver
extends BroadcastReceiver
    Class extending BroadcastReceiver, receives sms and handles them accordingly to application settings and sms senders phone number.
    Since:
    0.9beta
    Version:
    2.2.1
    Author:
    Robert Nyholm

    • Method Detail

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(Context context,
             Intent intent)
        Overridden method to receive intent, reacts on incoming sms. This receiver take proper actions depending on application settings and sms senders phone number.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        intent - Intent
        See Also:
        smsHandler(Context), #removeCountryCode(), checkAlarm(Context), getSmsReceivePrefs(Context), NoiseHandler#getRingerModeHandler(), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), setPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, Object, Context)

      • smsHandler

        private void smsHandler(Context context)
        Method to handle incoming sms. Aborts the systems broadcast and stores the sms in the device inbox. This method is also responsible for playing ringtone via NoiseHandler.makeNoise(Context, int, boolean, boolean) , vibrate and start intent.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        See Also:
        onReceive(Context, Intent), getSmsReceivePrefs(Context), makeNoise(Context, int, boolean, boolean), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), logAlarm(List, Context), setPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, Object, Context), acquire(Context), release(), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.DatabaseHandler, addAlarm(Alarm), getAllAlarm(), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.Alarm, ax.ha.it.smsalarm.AlarmTypes

      • getSmsReceivePrefs

        private void getSmsReceivePrefs(Context context)
        Method used to get all shared preferences needed by class SmsReceiver.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        See Also:
        onReceive(Context, Intent), smsHandler(Context), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), getPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, DataTypes, Context)

      • checkAlarm

        private boolean checkAlarm(Context context)
        To check if income sms fulfill criteria for either a PRIMARY or SECONDARY alarm.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        true if income sms was an alarm else false.
        See Also:
        checkSmsAlarm(Context), checkFreeTextAlarm(Context), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String)

      • checkSmsAlarm

        private boolean checkSmsAlarm(Context context)
        To check if received sms is any alarm. The check is done by a equality control of the senders phone number and the phone numbers read from SharedPreferences.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        true if income sms was an alarm else false.
        See Also:
        setAlarmType(AlarmTypes, Context), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), setPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, Object, Context)

      • checkFreeTextAlarm

        private boolean checkFreeTextAlarm(Context context)
        To check if received Sms is any alarm. The check is done by a controlling if any of the free texts(words) is found in received Sms.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        true if income sms was an alarm else false.
        See Also:
        setTriggerText(String), setAlarmType(AlarmTypes, Context), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), setPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, Object, Context)

      • setAlarmType

        private void setAlarmType(AlarmTypes alarmType,
                Context context)
        Convenience method to set this objects AlarmTypes.
        Parameters:
        alarmType - Alarm type to be set.
        context - context
        See Also:

      • setTriggerText

        private void setTriggerText(java.lang.String triggerText)
        Convenience method to set this objects trigger text.
        Parameters:
        triggerText - Text to be set as trigger text.
        See Also:
        logCat(LogPriorities, String, String)

      • findWordEqualsIgnore

        private boolean findWordEqualsIgnore(java.lang.String wordToFind,
                           java.lang.String textToParse)
        To check if String(textToParse) passed in as argument contains another String(wordToFind) passed in as argument. This method only checks whole words and not a CharSequence. Method is not case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        wordToFind - Word to find.
        textToParse - Text to look for word in.
        Returns:
        true if word is found else false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either or both params wordToFind and textToParse is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either or both params wordToFind and textToParse is empty.

      • isKitKatOrHigher

        private boolean isKitKatOrHigher()
        Convenience method to figure out if Build.VERSION.SDK_INT equals to Build.VERSION_CODES.KITKAT or higher.
        Returns:
        true if Build.VERSION.SDK_INT equals to Build.VERSION_CODES.KITKAT else false.
        See Also:
        LogHandler.logCat(LogPriorities, String, String)
